title: Learn How To Make Elegant Websites In WordPress Step by Step
description:
Description
This course is designed to walk you step by step through setting up your own WordPress website without any WordPress experience or coding required.  Everything is explained in non technical terms step by step for students to make a fully working WordPress website. Roughly 30% of internet is run by WordPress. WordPress dominates 76.4% of CMS Market Share and it’s FREE.WordPress powers thousands of government websites in all parts of the world. WordPress is used by thousands of universities, colleges, and schools all over the world. WordPress has more than 50,000 free plugins. WordPress is Available in 68+ Languages

Who is the target audience?
    This course is for anyone who is looking to earn money from making website for others.
    Anyone who wants to learn how to make websites in WordPress.
    This course is for you if you don’t want to pay someone to make you a website.
    This course is for small business owners.
    This course is for everyone who want to learn how to make gorgeous looking websites without any coding skills.
    This course is for people looking to learn the basics of WordPress.
    This is NOT for people who want to learn how to Learn WordPress theme development.
    This Course is Not for people who want to learn CSS or HTML or Any other coding Languague.
Requirements
    Computer
    Internet Connection
    If you know how to use the internet little bit then you’ll easily be able to create a stunning website with WordPress. Just follow all the steps in the course

parsed.dn: Learn How To Make Elegant Websites In WordPress Step by Step
parsed.name: Learn How To Make Elegant Websites In WordPress Step by Step
